HERO.TITLE: Find Your
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Not casual dating. Not guesswork. A structured space where clarity meets connection and relationships are built with intention.

FEATURES.LABEL: Why Gylde
FEATURES.TITLE: Clarity, Not Guesswork
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Our members join because they want structure around what matters most—lifestyle, ambition, generosity, and intention.

LIFESTYLE.TITLE: Lifestyle Expectations
LIFESTYLE.DESCRIPTION: Be upfront about how you live and what you expect. No ambiguity—just aligned lifestyles from the start.

AMBITION.TITLE: Ambition & Growth
AMBITION.DESCRIPTION: Connect with members who value personal development, career goals, and building toward something greater.

GENEROSITY.TITLE: Generosity & Support
GENEROSITY.DESCRIPTION: A space for those open to giving and receiving support. Clear about intentions, respectful in approach.

INTENTION.TITLE: Built with Intention
INTENTION.DESCRIPTION: Every relationship here starts with purpose. No games, no uncertainty—just genuine, intentional connections.

VERIFIED.TITLE: Verified Members
VERIFIED.DESCRIPTION: Every profile is verified. Know that the person you are connecting with is real, serious, and authentic.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy & Discretion
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Your privacy matters. Share on your terms with robust controls designed for your peace of mind.

STEP_1.TITLE: Define What You Want
STEP_1.DESCRIPTION: Our structured profile guides you through lifestyle, ambitions, and relationship expectations. No guessing—just clarity.

STEP_2.TITLE: Find Aligned Matches
STEP_2.DESCRIPTION: Browse verified members who share your intentions. Filter by what matters: lifestyle, goals, and openness to support.

STEP_3.TITLE: Connect with Purpose
STEP_3.DESCRIPTION: Start conversations knowing you are both on the same page. Build relationships grounded in mutual respect and clear intentions.

VALUES.LABEL: Our Promise
VALUES.TITLE: Structure That Works
VALUES.DESCRIPTION: We built Gylde because dating should not require decoding mixed signals. Our platform gives you the structure to be clear about what you want—and find others who want the same.

LIST.CLEAR_EXPECTATIONS: Clear expectations from the first message
LIST.ZERO_TOLERANCE: Zero tolerance for dishonesty or games
LIST.STRUCTURED_PROFILES: Structured profiles that surface what matters
LIST.MUTUAL_RESPECT: A community built on mutual respect

CTA.TITLE: We Provide the
CTA.DESCRIPTION: You define the connection. Join a community built on clarity, intention, and mutual respect.

FOOTER.TAGLINE: We provide the structure. You define the connection.
FOOTER.DISCLAIMER: Gylde is a dating platform. We do not facilitate or condone any form of illegal activity.

STEP_1.TITLE: Let's Get Started
STEP_1.SUBTITLE: First, a few basics to ensure Gylde is right for you.
STEP_1.BIRTHDAY_HINT: We use this to verify your age and show it on your profile.
STEP_1.AGE_REQUIRED: You must be at least 18 years old to join Gylde.

STEP_2.TITLE: About You
STEP_2.SUBTITLE: Help us understand who you are and who you're looking to meet.
STEP_2.INTERESTED_QUESTION: Who are you interested in dating?
STEP_2.AGE_RANGE_QUESTION: What age range are you interested in?

STEP_3.TITLE: Your Intentions
STEP_3.SUBTITLE: What kind of connections are you open to? This helps us match you with like-minded members.
STEP_3.CONNECTIONS_QUESTION: What kind of connections are you open to?
STEP_3.INTENTIONAL_DATING_DESC: Dating with purpose and clear communication
STEP_3.EXPLORING_DESC: Open to possibilities, but with purpose

STEP_4.TITLE: Support Orientation
STEP_4.SUBTITLE: Relationships involve different dynamics. This helps us understand what feels right for you.
STEP_4.SUPPORT_QUESTION: In a relationship, which best describes you?
STEP_4.SUPPORT_HINT: Select all that apply. This is optional.
STEP_4.EITHER: Open to either, depending on the connection

STEP_5.TITLE: Values & Lifestyle
STEP_5.SUBTITLE: What matters most to you? This helps us find truly compatible matches.
STEP_5.VALUES_QUESTION: Which values matter most to you in a relationship?
STEP_5.LIFESTYLE_QUESTION: How would you describe your current lifestyle?

STEP_6.TITLE: In Your Own Words
STEP_6.SUBTITLE: Help others understand what you're looking for. Be authentic—it leads to better connections.
STEP_6.IDEAL_QUESTION: What does an ideal relationship look like to you?
STEP_6.IDEAL_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the relationship you're hoping to build...
STEP_6.IDEAL_HINT: Be specific about what matters to you. This will appear on your profile.
STEP_6.SUPPORT_QUESTION: What does feeling supported in a relationship mean to you?
STEP_6.SUPPORT_PLACEHOLDER: Share what support means to you...
STEP_6.SUPPORT_HINT: Optional, but helps matches understand your perspective.

STEP_7.TITLE: Add Your Photos
STEP_7.SUBTITLE: Show the real you. Profiles with authentic photos get significantly more meaningful matches.
STEP_7.UPLOAD_HINT: Drag and drop or click to upload

STEP_8.TITLE: Build Trust
STEP_8.SUBTITLE: Verified profiles get more matches and build trust faster. You can always do this later.
STEP_8.VERIFY_QUESTION: Would you like to verify your profile?
STEP_8.IDENTITY_VERIFY_DESC: Confirm your identity with a government ID
STEP_8.PHOTO_VERIFY_DESC: Take a quick selfie to confirm you match your photos

COMPLETE.TITLE: Welcome to Gylde
COMPLETE.SUBTITLE: Your profile is ready. Start exploring intentional connections.

DASHBOARD.DISCOVER_SUB: Browse verified profiles aligned with your intentions.
DASHBOARD.MATCHES_EMPTY: When you match with someone, they'll appear here.
DASHBOARD.MESSAGES_EMPTY: Start a conversation with one of your matches.

LOGIN.TITLE: Welcome Back
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Sign in to continue your journey.

SIGNUP.TITLE: Join Gylde
SIGNUP.SUBTITLE: Create your account and start connecting.

RESET.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET.SUBTITLE: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
RESET.SUCCESS: Check your email for a password reset link.
